divs: sighting detailsuruapan, michoac���n, mexico i just woke up and finished a cup of coffee. i live in a spanish style house ( all the rooms communicate to a patio in the center of the house). at 5:55am november 8, 2010 i went out side my kitchen to look at the sky and saw 7 to 9 dim white lights in a delta or boomerang formation moving slowly through the sky silently. they were a little dimmer than the surrounding stars. they came from the east\south east and turned north. the relationship of the distances between the light seemd to bend or curve as it turned north. i lost sight of the lights when they passed behind my neighbors house. the whole event lasted maybe 15 seconds. i thought it was meterorites or space junk at first but it did not leave a trail and changed direction. i wanted to grab my cell phone and try to take a picture but i wouldn't have had time. i was amazed at what i saw because i know it wasn't a commercial jet. i am sure it wasn't the flight that arrives from tijuana because that passed at 6:21am over my house and makes a lot of noise. i didn't want to call the authorities because of the current environment here, they would just laugh.
Summary: 9 dim lights in a delta formation
trends: There have been no other sightings in Uruapan
This sighting has never been favorited.
